lines.text: [after performing an autopsy on a ripper murder victim]
He used a blade. Stuck it up her joy trail, and slit her wide open. He could have done a slightly better job if he had more time. But overall, it was a good, efficient butchery.

Fred, have you flipped out, or are you trying to give me an ulcer? A smart-ass coroner comes out with a little verbal diarrhea, and you immediately go around declaring there's a maniac loose in the city.
Yeah, so what do you want me to say? A boy scout's been widdling on girls with his knife?

[voice]
But you won't understand me, you'll never understand me! You're too stupid! Quack! Quack! Quack!
[overseeing the autopsy on the 'Ripper' Scellenda]
So, what's the good news, Barry?
Well, from the pulmonary result, the cause of death was suffocation. Self-inflicted by the plastic bag thrown over his head.
What about the time of death?
That I have for you exactly. Between four and five AM on Tuesday the 10th, eight days ago.
Eight days? Bullshit! That son-of-a-bitch murdered Kitty just four days ago. He couldn't have have been dead for eight days! You're wrong!

Come on, Barnaby. How long have we known each other? How long have I been a coroner? 16 years! Now, if I say the time of death was eight days ago, then the time of death was eight days ago! Sure, I admit I could be a few hours off, but no more.
Jesus Christ...
Does it really matter?
Yeah, it does.
[Rosie, riding a bicycle, accidently brushes past a misogynist owner's red Volkswagen]
Hey! Watch where you're going!
I'm sorry. I was thinking of Boston.
You women are all the same! A menace to society! You women should stay at home where you belong. You've got the brains of a chicken!
And you're an asshole! Ciao!
Well, if it isn't the big chief person himself.
Hello, Fred. I need to talk to you and it's kind of hush-hush. Is there anywhere private where we can talk?
Sure. How about the church across the street?
Would you get me some coffee?
Sweetheart! I'm a prositute, not your wife. If you want coffee, make it yourself!
